info.name: site
info.description: The location of the Jira site. NOTE: If you are not using SSL on your site, your username and password will sent insecurely.

info.name: username
info.description: Username for the desired Jira account.

info.name: password
info.description: Password for the desired Jira account.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
